verbs.description: [ARG0: The sweeping $ 1.3 trillion budget bill] [ARGM-MNR: substantially] [V: boosts] [ARG1: military and domestic spending] but leaves behind young immigrant " Dreamers , " deprives President Donald Trump some of his border wall money and takes only incremental steps to address gun violence .
